channel.title: CVE Feed for Palantir -- Gotham
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Palantir -- Gotham

item.title: CVE-2022-27892|2024-08-03T05:41:10.811Z -- palantir -- gotham
item.description: Palantir Gotham versions prior to 3.22.11.2 included an unauthenticated endpoint that would have allowed an attacker to exhaust the memory of the Gotham dispatch service.

item.title: CVE-2022-27897|2024-08-03T05:41:10.543Z -- palantir -- gotham
item.description: Palantir Gotham versions prior to 3.22.11.2 included an unauthenticated endpoint that would load portions of maliciously crafted zip files to memory. An attacker could repeatedly upload a malicious zip file, which would allow them to exhaust memory resources on the dispatch server.

item.title: CVE-2022-27891|2024-08-03T05:41:10.603Z -- palantir -- gotham
item.description: Palantir Gotham included an unauthenticated endpoint that listed all active usernames on the stack with an active session. The affected services have been patched and automatically deployed to all Apollo-managed Gotham instances. It is highly recommended that customers upgrade all affected services to the latest version. This issue affects: Palantir Gotham versions prior to 103.30221005.0.
